title: TAW Wants you!
body:
**TAW** wants you

Finding a new community is like looking for a new home. You want it to be a warm and fun place where you feel welcome and we are trying to give you exactly this feeling!

TAW is broken up into several divisions in which their members participate in weekly scheduled training/practice matches and occasional events, for instance internal tournaments. We also frequently play against other clans/gaming groups when the interest arises. Each game we play hosts its own mini-environment that operates within the whole of TAW making us the large community we are. From FPS games to MMORPGs - you name it - we have it all.

Here in the League of Legends division we welcome all players from the casual to the competitive. TAW holds League of Legends practices twice a week over TeamSpeak. Community members are divided into squads of 5 which are kept as consistent as possible every week, and are led by a trained "Fireteam Leader".

We welcome everyone from all around the world. We specifically have battalions for both EU servers, the NA server and OC as well.

**Battalion 2/3 Europe Nordic-East/West:**
Sun & Wed 20:00 CET 

**What sets us aside from other gaming communities?**
The Art of Warfare (TAW) was formed in 2001 by members who played Delta Force: Land Warrior together. From these humble beginnings TAW has grown into an organization unlike any other. This reflects on our Code of Ethics and our Chain of Command (CoC). Both of these are formed on a military basis. This includes having ranks like they do in the army, etc. Every member in TAW (just as a fun fact: we have 2400+ members) abides by our Code of Ethics.

If you are interested in joining our growing community, we believe that you will find TAW to be a welcoming and accepting group of good people who just want to enjoy the gaming experience.

**Make sure you have the following:**
1. A working microphone
2. Teamspeak 3
3. Practical experience in the English language

To apply go to www.taw.net and click on apply in the top right corner. Make sure to check your e-mail regularly for updates on your application. Don’t forget to check your spam folder.
